title: Changing Medicare Plan through Ensurem
text: Kelli was very personable and professional, and she answered every question I asked.  She looked up every doctor on my current plan to make sure they were on the new plan.  She did a price comparison for all my drugs and I am happy to say I will be saving costs in this area.  We covered out-patient costs and in-patient costs. She dotted every I and crossed every T.  I have never been given this treatment before when I was contemplating a new plan.  She made sure that I was comfortable with my new plan before I made the decision to change.  Thank you, Kelli.
